Reviews.Title: “Good Stay... for the Price!”
Reviews.Author: jarIndiana
Reviews.Content: I have noticed some mixed reviews of this property. 2 weeks ago, we stayed at this hotel and reserved a room at the AAA rate which was less than $60.00. Our room came with a King sized bed, coffee maker, microwave, and mini-fridge. The La Quinta was also close to several nice eateries and some local shopping. I cant speak for anyone else but....our room was clean and fairly modern looking. The gentleman at the front desk did a fantastic job with hospitality. We did not utilize it, but there was also an indoor pool. For the services and value that we recieved for the price, I would recommend this to travelers who want a decent room and value for their money. I too..would stay here again. Good luck with your travels.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: HCS48
Reviews.Content: We stayed the weekend of the Brickyard 2011. We finally settled into our 3rd room, the first had an air conditioner leak, the second the air conditioner did not work right and the third worked but there was no frig or microwave but we were tired of moving by then. There were BB or bullet holes in our window. There was screaming and doors slamming throughout the night. The breakfast had a lot to be desired and that was when there was breakfast. Sunday morning they ran out of almost everything. We will not be staying there again if we visit Indy. The one good thing that made it bearable was the staff was accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing extraordinary”
Reviews.Author: ExpertComptable
Reviews.Content: Convenient and relatively inexpensive. Helpful and cheerful staff and the accomodation was quite adequate for an overnight. Internet was included and worked well. Basically an acceptable overnight in a rather dated and gloomy building. Would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: teresa226
Reviews.Content: Checking person is very friendly. The hallways were bright and attractive. The room was large, clean, wirh wll designed furniture, clean carpet and a super comfortable bed. There were plenty of spare outlets for ipods, laptops and cell phone charging. The bathroom was also quite nice. The elevators were always fast. Overall, nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: bcevh
Reviews.Content: Got in late, 1st room had pubic hair and bed bugs in the sheets when first pulled back. Tried another room, even more bed bugs. Went to better/clean hotel in middle of the night. NASTY!!!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap in more ways then one”
Reviews.Author: chicagotoots
Reviews.Content: Great location, friendly service, beautiful indoor heated pool, rooms clean, comfortable, breakfast LQ standard, pet friendly and decent price. Because we travel with our pet, we have attained elite status which gives us bottled water and snack. They don't tell you it is only ONE bottle of water and ONE snack per room. So if you are an elite member, count on sharing a bottle of water.

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay”
Reviews.Author: wild402
Reviews.Content: We were in Indianapolis for our conference. We absolutely loved this place. Staff was very friendly. Enjoyed pool. All kinds of restaurent is around this hotel. Value was very good as well. Difinitely will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”
Reviews.Author: BarbaraBooey
Reviews.Content: On a road trip from Philadelphia to Los Angeles with my grown up son, we stopped at this La Quinta our first night on the road. The price was good, the room clean, the beds pretty comfortable. We thought it was such a good value that we stayed at La Quinta's for the rest of the nights on the road. The only one we wouldn't recommend is the one on Rt. 70 in Albequerque....hair in bathtub, bad pillows, old facility. The La Quinta suites in Flagstaff was really nice...although the complimentary breakfast was not so good in any of the facilities. I would definitely stay at a La Quinta again.

Reviews.Title: “Glad we found this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mama3boys
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights while we visited Indy. The room was a good size, with 2 queen beds, and was very clean. It was nice to have a refrig and microwave in the room. The bathroom was small, but clean, and the shower worked great. The kids enjoyed the indoor pool and the breakfast was well-stocked, the make-your-own waffles were nice. The staff was very friendly. We got a great deal (less than $70 a night) and it was WELL worth it! Disregard the old reviews, I highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice facilities”
Reviews.Author: BahamaJoesAdventures
Reviews.Content: When I pulled up, the the hotel seemed fairly new from the outside, and the lobby and all are in great condition. The rooms are also nice and they have an indoor swimming pool which the kids loved. The rooms had a microwave/refrig, coffee makers, and hair dryers. I would say for the price I paid I got a pretty good deal. All the other hotels in the area were asking rates from $80 - $90. I will most likely return here.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap is What You Get”
Reviews.Author: DallasJackson57
Reviews.Content: All I need is a comfortable bed and a hot shower. The bed was bad but the shower was ok. The hotel room was cheap and probably worth the low price. If you are looking for something nice then pay more somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Awful!!”
Reviews.Author: lisaElkhart_IN
Reviews.Content: This hotel was terrible! Our room was not clean. There were crumbs on the floor. The bathroom had mold growing in the tub area. This hotel needs a complete remodel. The entire hotel smelled like B.O. I'll never stay there again!

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn Indianapolis North at Pyramids
HotelInfo.Address: 3880 West 92nd Street, Indianapolis, IN 46268
